biography:
Sreekumar Achary, better known by his stage name Jagathy Sreekumar, is an Indian film actor who has starred in more than 1,000 Malayalam films. 

He is a veteran actor of Malayalam cinema who holds the Guinness Book of World Records for essaying roles in more than a thousand films.
name: Jagathy Sreekumar
